name: Veggie Patch
description:
Veggie Patch is a farming sim game originally created for GMC Jam 3. It has been updated and upgraded - particularly to graphics - and you can play now in HTML5 on any device. The aim of the game is to grow vegetables in your veggie patch across the year and make as much money as possible.

In order to be successful, you will need to earn enough money to unlock new veg, learn when different veg will grow through the year, keep your veg well-watered and stop the snails eating everything! Each year different veg is in demand and this affects their market price!
